data: Do not administer IV lipids, propofol infusion or acetylsalicyclic acid or IV carnitine
Monitor patient fpr signs of:  - Volume overload  - Arrhythmia  - Compartmental syndrome  - Acute renal failure
Do not administer pedialyte - it does not contain enough calories / carbohydrates
PLACEHOLDER: MCT Oil (parents supply) 0.5 g/kg PO / NG q 3 to 4 hours if not tolerating sick day formula

Continue IV Fluids if:  - POC Glucose Whole Blood less then 3.5 mmol/L  - If patietn is normoglycemic but not able to tolerate oral intake  - If patient has diarhhea, vomiting, dehydration, abnormal labs, high fever
